column1: House Vote #35 1789-09-28T00:00:00 - TO DISAGREE TO THE SENATE AMENDMENT TO H.R. 27
column2: TO ADOPT TO THE CONSTITUTION THE ESTABLISHMENT OF THE TROOPS RAISED UNDER RESOLVES OF THE OLD CONGRESS
column3: WITH AMENDMENTS; SAID AMENDMENT WOULD AMEND THE CONSTITUTION BY EMPOWERING THE PRESIDENT TO CALL OUT THE MILITIA GENERALLY FOR THE PROTECT- ION OF THE FRONTIERS AGAINST INVASION BY HOSTILE INDIANS.
